description: Attractive and classic, these delicious crêpe bundles are perfect for the festive season or any other elegant occasion.
name: Chive-tied Crêpe Bundles With Smoked Salmon & Lemon Crème Fraîche Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drop the long chives into a pan of boiling water. Drain and rinse immediately under cold water. Pat dry on kitchen paper.
Stamp out 4 rounds from each crêpe with the cookie cutter. Combine the lemon zest, crème fraîche, and smoked salmon. Place 1 tsp of the mixture in the centre of each crêpe.
Sprinkle with chives and a pinch of pepper. Carefully bring the edges of each crêpe together into a little bundle. Tie each bundle with a long chive. Refrigerate until chilled, 15 minutes.
